name: Marblelous 2
overview: Marblelous 2 is an action puzzler where you guide up to three marbles to the exit of a level while collecting items on the way. You don't control the marble directly, but through placing arrows on the ground that cause the ball to change direction. You lose a life if the ball collides with a wall or any obstacle. The game offers 100 levels in total and later levels introduce special objects like teleporters, shields or rails. The included level editor lets you create your own puzzles. You can also import your own graphics in the game from any paint program.
